titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction from gross income to individuals for expenses paid in using mass transit facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/23/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction, to both itemizers and nonitemizers, for mass transit expenses paid by a taxpayer.
